ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(
	COPY_RUNJOB_SCRIPT ALL
	COMMAND cmake -E copy
		"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/pio_runjob.sh"
		"${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/pio_runjob.sh"
	DEPENDS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/pio_runjob.sh"
)

ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(
	COPY_CETUS_ENV_SCRIPT ALL
	COMMAND cmake -E copy
		"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cetus_env.sh"
		"${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/cetus_env.sh"
	DEPENDS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cetus_env.sh"
)


ADD_CUSTOM_TARGET(
	COPY_CETUS_TEST_SCRIPT ALL
	COMMAND cmake -E copy
		"${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cetus_test.sh"
		"${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/cetus_test.sh"
	DEPENDS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cetus_test.sh"
)
